retrospective.summary: Added __cloud__ message interception in Router.sendDirect and Slack reply forwarding in Daemon. Messages to __cloud__ are intercepted, the sender's Slack context is looked up, and a POST is made to /api/daemons/slack-reply. Slack contexts are stored when cross-machine messages or spawn commands arrive with Slack metadata.
